headline: ‘So heartbreaking:’ Tim Ryan on war in Ukraine
author: Gerry Ricciutti
sentences: “We’re seeing now, as they retreat out of the capital city, the level of slaughter that Putin has caused there, and it’s so heartbreaking, and I just don’t see why.
(WKBN) — Valley Congressman Tim Ryan is still criticizing the world’s response to Ukraine as the invasion and war started by Russia enters its sixth week.
Poland has agreed to give Ukraine a number of its older fighter jets but the Biden Administration has not been willing to go along with the deal.
I understand the no-fly zone, but get these guys some planes so they can protect these innocent people,” said Ryan.
Ryan said Monday that he continues to push for Ukrainians to have the weapons they need to defend themselves.
There’s no reason we can’t get them airplanes.
